adobo.name: Chicken Adobo
adobo.description: Classic savory Filipino stew cooked with chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, and bay leaves. Known for its long shelf life and rich flavor, Adobo is a staple in many Filipino households.
risks: High sodium may raise blood pressure if eaten often
Moderate fat content when consumed in large portions

sinigang.name: Shrimp Sinigang
sinigang.description: A sour and refreshing Filipino soup made with shrimp, tamarind, and a variety of vegetables.
risks: May be high in sodium if too much seasoning is added
Shrimp may trigger allergies for some individuals

tinola.name: Chicken Tinola
tinola.description: A light and comforting ginger-based chicken soup with green papaya and chili leaves, often eaten when feeling unwell.
risks: Can become high in sodium with excessive fish sauce
Low calorie content may not be filling for some people

kare-kare.name: Beef Kare-Kare
kare-kare.description: A rich peanut-based stew traditionally made with beef and vegetables, usually paired with shrimp paste.
risks: High fat due to peanut sauce
Bagoong adds significant sodium

pork-menudo.name: Pork Menudo
pork-menudo.description: A tomato-based Filipino pork stew with potatoes, carrots, and liver, commonly served during gatherings.
risks: High fat when made with fatty pork cuts
Processed tomato sauce may contain added sugar and sodium

beef-caldereta.name: Beef Caldereta
beef-caldereta.description: A hearty Filipino beef stew cooked in tomato sauce with vegetables and cheese.
risks: High saturated fat from cheese and beef
Calorie-dense when eaten in large servings

pork-sisig.name: Pork Sisig
pork-sisig.description: A popular sizzling dish made from chopped pork, onions, calamansi, and chili.
risks: Very high fat and cholesterol
Frequent intake may increase heart disease risk

bicol-express.name: Bicol Express
bicol-express.description: A spicy Filipino dish made with pork cooked in coconut milk and chili peppers.
risks: High saturated fat from coconut milk
Very spicy, may irritate the stomach

lumpiang-shanghai.name: Lumpiang Shanghai
lumpiang-shanghai.description: Crispy fried spring rolls filled with ground pork and vegetables, often served as an appetizer.
risks: High fat due to deep frying
Easy to overeat because of small size

pork-humba.name: Pork Humba
pork-humba.description: A sweet and savory Filipino braised pork dish made with soy sauce, vinegar, and banana blossoms.
risks: High fat due to pork belly
Added sugar may affect blood sugar levels
